name: Clarite Research
tag_list: mass-qual, research, qual-research, quant-research, agile-research, qualitative, quantitative, multi-channel
overview:
Clarite is a research tool delivering granular, high volume qualitative insight, quickly and cost effectively, for all communications and concept collateral.

As a highly cost effective, online research tool for mass qualitative evaluation of marketing communications and concept collateral - including video, Clarite’s patent-pending STIKKY technology enables large volumes of respondents to provide highly granular feedback quickly and simply.

It can be deployed on the pre- and post-testing of just about any form of marketing communication which can be uploaded.

Through the use of virtual postits, Clarite’s patent-pending STIKKY technology allows large numbers of respondents to provide highly targeted and granular, qualitative feedback in a way that is both simple and engaging. Its ‘roll-over’ capability then makes the subsequent analysis and reporting quick and easy.

Clarite’s optional quantitative capability also enables clients to benchmark key issues relating to the communication as a whole - or more specific issues within it.

End-to-end projects typically take just 7-10 days but clients in more of a hurry to identify the big issues can get access to respondent feedback in real time via the client portal.

Clarite is available to both agencies and end-clients alike. It can be bought and used under licence or on a fully-supported, project-by-project basis.

Clarite can be used to assess and optimise: product guides, brochures, leaflets emails web pages customer service letters new proposition concept boards advertising story boards finished TV ads call centre conversation recordings and scripts
